content.description:
You will participate in a simulated exchange of text-chat message. When it is your turn to write, you will have 90 seconds to respond. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. Type your response in the target language. 

You will have a conversation with Akira Nakamura, a high school student in Japan, about how high school students  dress.
content.question:
Give some examples.
そうですか。ではどんな服を学校に着て行ってはいけないことになっていますか。

frqParts.text:
Give some examples.
そうですか。ではどんな服を学校に着て行ってはいけないことになっていますか。

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
